entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
